title: Did Sunny Deol donate Rs 100 crore to combat COVID-19? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post is being circulated on social media with a claim that actor turned politician and BJP MP from Gurdaspur, Sunny Deol, has donated Rs 100 crore to combat Coronavirus.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Old video from Azerbaijan re-shared as lockdown in Spain

NewsMobile fact-checked the viral post and found the claim to be false.

We checked the social media account of the actor and found a tweet dated March 25, 2020. In the tweet, Deol announced that he was donating Rs 50 lakhs from his MP fund to fight against COVID-19 in his constituency.

Hence, the above information proves that the news about Sunny Deol donating Rs 100 crore is FAKE.
